TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract PivotTable

summary.span: 代表工作表上的数据透视表。

span.span: Represents a PivotTable report on a worksheet.

summary.span: PivotTable对象所在的集合。

span.span: The PivotTable object is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 数据透视表集合包含在单张工作表上的所有数据透视表对象。

span.span: The PivotTables collection contains all the PivotTable objects on a single worksheet.

span.para: 使用数据透视表()，其中是数据透视表的索引号或名称，可返回一个PivotTable对象。
因为数据透视表报表编程可能会很复杂，通常最简单数据透视表操作录制，然后再修订录制的代码。要录制宏，指向工具菜单上的宏，然后单击录制新宏。
Use PivotTables(), where is the PivotTable index number or name, to return a single PivotTable object.

Because PivotTable report programming can be complex, it’s generally easiest to record PivotTable report actions and then revise the recorded code. To record a macro, point to Macro on the Tools menu and then click Record New Macro.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AllocateChanges() runtime managed

summary.span: 在基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表中的所有已编辑的单元格上执行回写操作。

span.span: Performs a writeback operation for all edited cells in a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source.

span.para: 方法将执行的自上次应用更改操作已提交，或更改从不如果提交应用创建数据透视表以来已执行以来进行的数据透视表值区域中的所有更改更新多维数据集语句。如果数据透视表报表基于非 OLAP 数据源上执行，此方法将产生一个运行时错误。

The method will execute an UPDATE CUBE statement for all changes made in the values area of the PivotTable since the last apply changes operation was committed, or since the PivotTable was created if committing apply changes has never been performed. This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a PivotTable report based on a non-OLAP data source.

summary.span: 获取或设置是否运行更新多维数据集进行编辑的每个单元格的语句，或仅当用户选择基于 OLAP 数据源对数据透视表执行模拟分析时计算更改。

span.span: Gets or sets whether to run an UPDATE CUBE statement for each cell is edited, or only when the user chooses to calculate changes when performing what-if analysis on a PivotTable based on an OLAP data source.
An object.

span.para: 读/写。
属性对应于计算设置在模拟分析设置对话框中的更改。默认设置是，对应于手动 （时选择计算更改的数据透视表） 设置。
Read/write.

The property corresponds to the Calculate with changes setting in the What-If Analysis Settings dialog box. The default setting is , which corresponds to the Manually (when selecting calculate PivotTable with changes) setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlAllocationMethod AllocationMethod { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlAllocationMethod get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlAllocationMethod value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置什么方法用来在基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表执行模拟分析时分配值。

span.span: Gets or sets what method to use to allocate values when performing what-if analysis on a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source.
An object.

span.para: 读/写。
属性对应于模拟分析设置对话框中的分配方法设置。默认设置是，对应于等于分配设置。如果属性设置为，其对应的加权分配设置，您可以选择指定加权表达式，用于通过设置属性。如果您不指定加权表达式，等价于加权表达式<的叶单元格值> / <现有值>用于。
Read/write.

The property corresponds to the Allocation Method setting in the What-If Analysis Settings dialog box. The default setting is , which corresponds to the Equal Allocation setting. If the property is set to , which corresponds to the Weighted Allocation setting, you can optionally specify the weight expression to use by setting the property. If you do not specify a weight expression, a weight expression equivalent to <leaf cell value> / <existing value> is used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowMultipleFilters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置或检索值，该值指示是否可以同时于多个筛选器。

span.span: Sets or retrieves a value that indicates whether a can have multiple filters applied to it at the same time.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 默认值为False。
时该属性设置为True，多个筛选器可以应用于单个。设置为False时, 应用筛选器是已筛选的将删除现有的筛选器并应用新。 此属性设置为False时具有多个筛选器应用将带有字段以无提示方式删除所有筛选器中的而不显示任何警告。但是，不通知时这是通过用户界面。
Default value is False.

When this property is set to True, multiple filters can be applied to a single . When it is set to False, applying a filter to a that is already filtered will remove the existing filter and apply the new one. Setting this property to False when the has fields with more than one filter applied will silently remove all filters in the without displaying any alert. However, there is an alert when this is done through the user interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CommitChanges() runtime managed

summary.span: 执行提交操作在基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表报告的数据源。

span.span: Performs a commit operation on the data source of a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source.

span.para: 方法将提交事务语句发送到 OLAP 服务器，并清除所有已编辑通过输入一个值，但不是会清除中的值单元格的公式的单元格。如果数据透视表报表基于非 OLAP 数据源上执行，此方法将产生一个运行时错误。

The method sends a COMMIT TRANSACTION statement to the OLAP server, and clears all cells that were edited by entering a value, but will not clear formulas in value cells. This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a PivotTable report based on a non-OLAP data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DiscardChanges() runtime managed

summary.span: 放弃基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表中经过编辑的单元格中的所有更改。

span.span: Discards all changes in the edited cells of a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source.

span.para: 的数据透视表报告中基于 OLAP 数据源，该方法删除所有值和输入值单元格中的公式，然后运行从数据源检索的最新值的数据透视表更新操作。将数据源的值设置为空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) 的所有值单元格的编辑，且还执行针对 OLAP 服务器的回滚事务语句。
如果您尝试执行此方法对于数据透视表报表基于非 OLAP 数据源，此方法将生成运行时错误。

For a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source, the method removes all values and formulas entered in value cells, and then runs a PivotTable update operation to retrieve the latest values from the data source. It sets the data source value to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) for all value cells that are edited, and also executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP server.
If you try to execute this method for a PivotTable report based on a non-OLAP data source, this method generates a run-time error.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableWriteback { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否为指定数据透视表启用了写回数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets whether writing back to the data source is enabled for the specified PivotTable.

value.span: 启用指定数据透视表; 如果为true将写回数据源否则为false。

span.span: true if writing back to the data source is enabled for the specified PivotTable; otherwise, false.
The default value is false.

span.para: 读/写。
对于 OLAP 数据源，设置为属性设置为true到启用写回并禁用当用户覆盖值的数据透视表数据区域中的警报。对于非 OLAP 数据源，设置属性设置为true支持写回在代码中，并且还允许用户更改数据值的以前无法更改。
和属性对象不能同时设置为true 。
如果属性设置为true ，然后属性设置为true，属性自动设置为false ，刷新数据透视表和数据值上进行的任何编辑是丢失。
如果属性设置为true ，然后属性设置为true，属性自动设置为false ，不会刷新数据透视表，和还原数据源值。
对于非 OLAP 数据源，设置此属性会生成运行时错误。
Read/write.

For OLAP data sources, setting to the property to true to enables writeback and disables the alert for when the user overwrites values in the data area of the PivotTable. For non-OLAP data sources, setting the property to true enables write-back in code, and also allows the user to change data values that previously could not be changed.
The and properties of the object cannot be set to true at the same time.
If the property is set to true and then the property is set to true, the property is set to false automatically, the PivotTable is refreshed, and any editing performed on data values is lost.
If the property is set to true and then the property is set to true, the property is set to false automatically, the PivotTable is not refreshed, and the data source values are restored.
For non-OLAP data sources, setting this property generates a run-time error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RefreshDataSourceValues() runtime managed

summary.span: 针对处于回写模式的数据透视表中的所有已编辑的单元格，从数据源中检索当前值。

span.span: Retrieves the current values from the data source for all edited cells in a PivotTable report that is in writeback mode.

span.para: 若要确定数据透视表是否处于回写模式，请查看或属性对象，其中任一将返回 True。对于不处于回写模式的数据透视表报表，尝试执行此方法将生成运行时错误。
的数据透视表使用 OLAP 数据源执行方法创建一个单独的连接到 OLAP 服务器，并执行完整的 MDX 查询 (的值。属性)，用于执行到更新操作填充数据透视表。Excel 中提取返回在数据透视表视图中，已编辑的所有单元格的值，然后将其存储属性对这些单元格。
此方法仅适用于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表报告。尝试执行此方法或非 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表报告生成运行时错误。

To determine if a PivotTable report is in writeback mode, check the or properties of the object, either of which will return True. For PivotTable reports that are not in writeback mode, trying to execute this method generates a run-time error.

For PivotTable reports with OLAP data sources, executing the method creates a separate connection to the OLAP server and executes the full MDX query (the value of the . property) that is used to perform an update operation to populate the PivotTable report. Excel extracts the values returned for all cells that have been edited in the PivotTable view, and then stores them in the property for those cells.
This method applies only to PivotTable reports with OLAP data sources. Trying to execute this method or PivotTable reports with non-OLAP data sources generates a run-time error.

summary.span: 如果在基于 OLAP 数据源的指定数据透视表中，每个分类汇总和总计旁都显示有星号 (\*)，则该值为 True。默认值为 True。Boolean 类型，可读写。

span.span: True if an asterisk (\*) is displayed next to each subtotal and grand total value in the specified PivotTable report if the report is based on an OLAP data source. The default value is True. Read/write Boolean.

span.para: 当此属性设置为True时，星号表示汇总中包含隐藏的项。无论在报表中的任何项目是否已被隐藏会显示星号。
对于非 OLAP 数据源，此属性的值总是False。
When this property is set to True, the asterisk indicates that hidden items are included in the total. The asterisk appears regardless of whether any items in the report have been hidden.
For non-OLAP data sources, the value of this property is always False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VisualTotals { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True（默认） 启用联机分析处理 (OLAP) 数据透视表项已从视图中隐藏后，重新计算总。

span.span: True (default) to enable Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) PivotTables to recalculate the total after an item has been hidden from view.

summary.span: 可读写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

span.para: 中非-OLAP 数据透视表，如果隐藏了项目，将重新进行汇总以反映仅仍可见的数据透视表中的项目。在 OLAP 数据透视表，总计计算的服务器上，因此不受影响的任何项目在数据透视表视图中的隐藏是否。但是，如果 OLAP 数据透视表的VisualTotals属性设置为False ，然后 OLAP 数据透视表的结果将匹配的非-OLAP 数据透视表。
用于 OLAP 数据透视表，用于非-OLAP 数据透视表所述的VisualTotals属性设置为True （默认值） 工作方式相同。
，其 VisualTotals属性返回True的所有新数据透视表。但是，如果当前版本的 Microsoft Excel 中打开工作簿，具有已在以前版本的 Excel 中创建数据透视表的VisualTotals属性将返回False。

In non-OLAP PivotTables, if you hide an item, the total is recomputed to reflect only the items that remain visible in the PivotTable. In an OLAP PivotTable, the total is computed on the server and is therefore unaffected by whether any items are hidden in the PivotTable view. However, if the VisualTotals property is set to False for an OLAP PivotTable, then the results of the OLAP PivotTable will match those of the non-OLAP PivotTable.
For OLAP PivotTables, a VisualTotals property setting of True (default) works the same way as described for non-OLAP PivotTables.

The VisualTotals property returns True for all new PivotTables. However, if you open a workbook in the current version of Microsoft Excel and the PivotTable had been created in a previous version of Excel, the VisualTotals property will return False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VisualTotalsForSets { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否包括过滤为指定数据透视表命名集的汇总中的项。

span.span: Gets or sets whether to include filtered items in the totals of named sets for the specified PivotTable.

value.span: true如果过滤为指定数据透视表命名集的汇总中的项都包含;否则为false。

span.span: true if filtered items in the totals of named sets for the specified PivotTable are included; otherwise, false.
The default is false

span.para: 读/写。
，则返回 true如果命名集汇总中包含筛选的项目; 否则为false。此属性的默认值为false。
中基于数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，您可以配置是否汇总在数据透视表命名集将包括已筛选的项目。设置属性对应于组上汇总的汇总复选框中包含筛选项目&数据透视表选项对话框的筛选器选项卡。
Read/write.
true if filtered items are included in the totals for named sets; otherwise false. The default value of this property is false.

In a PivotTable based on an OLAP data source, you can configure whether totals for named sets in the PivotTable will include items that have been filtered. The setting of the property corresponds to the Include filtered items in set totals check box on the Totals & Filters tab of the PivotTable Options dialog box.
